img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Five_Skandhas_%2821%29.png)
You'll need to ascend quite high up, but where the path reaches a dead end, up above there's an opening in the cliff that you can pass through. Follow this until you enter an area that's slightly covered and pass through this tunnel.
img_below_text:
As you emerge in the wide open space, a Giant Shigandang will appear.
### Yaoguai King - Giant Shigandang

img_summary:
### Summary of the Image:

The image depicts a dimly lit, rocky tunnel with twisted, barren trees framing the scene. Light pours through an opening in the cliff ahead, suggesting an exit or transition point. This setting aligns with the preceding text, which describes ascending to a cliff opening and passing through a tunnel. The image serves as a visual representation of the player's progression through the area, leading to a wide-open space where the Giant Shigandang encounter is imminent.
